lines.text: But now I want you to remember to stay good boys & girls. Respect your mothers & fathers and do what they tell you. Obey your teachers and learn a whooooole lot! Now *if you do this*, I'll make sure you get good presents from me eeeevery year. Ha ha ha... but if you're bad boys & girls, your name goes in the 'Bad Boys & Girls' book, and I'll bring you something... horrible.
You want it all... but you're no longer a child.
[last line after Harry gets away from the vigilante mob]
But I heard him exclaim as he drove out of sight, "Merry Christmas to all, and to all a good night."
